headline.main: Live Blog: The Panetta Confirmation Hearing

docs.abstract: Leon E. Panetta, the director of the C.I.A. — and President Obama’s choice to lead the Department of Defense — appears on Capitol Hill today for his confirmation hearing.
docs.lead_paragraph: Leon E. Panetta, the director of the C.I.A. — and President Obama’s choice to lead the Department of Defense — appears on Capitol Hill Thursday for his confirmation hearing before the Senate Armed Services Committee. A master of Congressional relationships and all but a lock for confirmation, Mr. Panetta will still face some tough questions about administration policy in Afghanistan and Iraq, spending plans for the Pentagon and the fighting in the Middle East and North Africa, especially in Libya.
docs.snippet: Leon E. Panetta, the director of the C.I.A. — and President Obama’s choice to lead the Department of Defense — appears on Capitol Hill today for his confirmation hearing.
